live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience!

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored.
56957.summary: Some customers in the Lynn Valley area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56957.title: Jan 14 - North Vancouver (Lynn Valley) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided by 3:39PM MT
56959.summary: Some customers in the Sun Valley area of Port Coquitlam are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56959.title: Jan 14 - Port Coquitlam (Sun Valley) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
